entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: A Hogwarts staff member who is interested in taking a Kwikspell course.

entities.name: madam z. nettles
entities.description: A witch who has benefited from the Kwikspell method and writes a testimonial about it.

entities.name: d.j. prod
entities.description: A warlock who has also benefited from the Kwikspell method and writes a testimonial about it.

entities.name: kwikspell
entities.description: An all-new, fail-safe, quick-result, easy-learn course for witches and wizards.

relationships.description: Harry is interested in learning more about Filch's interest in taking a Kwikspell course.
Madam Z. Nettles has benefited from the Kwikspell method, as described in her testimonial.
D.J. Prod has also benefited from the Kwikspell method, as described in his testimonial.
